t: Blessed*pn are all who fear the Lord,*s who*ld walk in obedience to him.
You*ln will eat the fruit of your labor; blessings*ld and prosperity will be yours.
Your*ln wife will be like a fruitful vine within*ld your house; your*ln children will be like olive shoots around*ld your table.
Yes,*ln this will be the blessing for*ld the man who fears the Lord.*s
May*pn the Lord*s bless you from Zion; may*ld you see the prosperity of Jerusalem all*ld the days of your life.
May*ln you live to see your children’s children— peace*ld be on Israel.
